item.title: FreeBSD Quickstart Guide for Linux速 Users
item.description:
Abstract

This document is intended to quickly familiarize intermediate to advanced Linux速 users with the basics of FreeBSD.

1. Introduction

This document highlights some of the technical differences between FreeBSD and Linux速 so that intermediate to advanced Linux速 users can quickly familiarize themselves with the basics of FreeBSD.

This document assumes that FreeBSD is already installed. Refer to the Installing FreeBSD chapter of the FreeBSD Handbook for help with the installation process.
